trans-unit.source: In order to make partners feel comfortable with moving to Open Publishing, we recommend partners to perform a visual inspection of the content.
trans-unit.target: In order to make partners feel comfortable with moving to Open Publishing, we recommend partners to perform a visual inspection of the content.

trans-unit.source: Here is some items to look for.
trans-unit.target: Here is some items to look for.

trans-unit.source: If you are moving content from another system (CAPS, OA, etc.), please note that the content might not render exactly the same.
trans-unit.target: If you are moving content from another system (CAPS, OA, etc.), please note that the content might not render exactly the same.

trans-unit.source: So use your legacy content for reference, although do not expect a 1-to-1 mapping.
trans-unit.target: So use your legacy content for reference, although do not expect a 1-to-1 mapping.

trans-unit.source: We recommend you find different pages with different content types, so you have a good breadth of content to look at.
trans-unit.target: We recommend you find different pages with different content types, so you have a good breadth of content to look at.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, you should look at the content in different screen resolutions, as OP uses the responsive library and content renders differently.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, you should look at the content in different screen resolutions, as OP uses the responsive library and content renders differently.

trans-unit.source: TOC is complete and working as expected: it expands and collapses, and links are working.
trans-unit.target: TOC is complete and working as expected: it expands and collapses, and links are working.

trans-unit.source: Content URLs – If you are moving from OA and you are leveraging the URLs, make sure that they are indeed the same while you are testing.
trans-unit.target: Content URLs – If you are moving from OA and you are leveraging the URLs, make sure that they are indeed the same while you are testing.

trans-unit.source: Links render properly and work as expected
trans-unit.target: Links render properly and work as expected

trans-unit.source: Formatting of the topics is as expected
trans-unit.target: Formatting of the topics is as expected
